/BIGDATA/nsccgz_pcheng_1/install/mpich/bin/mpicxx   -g -Wall -Wno-deprecated-declarations -Wsign-compare -std=c++11 -Wall -O0 -DTHREAD -D_FILE_OFFSET_BITS=64 -libverbs -lfuse -I/usr/local/glex/include -L/usr/local/glex/lib -lglex -lpthread -I/BIGDATA/nsccgz_pcheng_1/install/kyotocabinet-1.2.77/include -L/BIGDATA/nsccgz_pcheng_1/install/kyotocabinet-1.2.77/lib -lkyotocabinet -lz -lstdc++ -lrt -lpthread -lm -lc  -L/usr/local/lib/libfuse.so    CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/hashtable.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/lock.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/filesystem.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/TxManager.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/dmfs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/bitmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/storage.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/fs/sha256.c.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/net/Configuration.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/net/RPCServer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/net/RPCClient.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/net/RdmaSocket.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/net/mempool.cpp.o CMakeFiles/dmfs.dir/src/tools/debug.cpp.o  -o dmfs -rdynamic -lcrypto -lcryptopp -ldl
